title: Scenario: The time zone of the page of a certain league should be set to the timezone of the team
custom_preconds:
Given the page navigated to is a team page such that the URL is wap.mlb.com/<teamId> 
And the team is one a member of one of the Minor Leagues
custom_steps: When the user scrolls down the page to the Schedules and Results Section.
custom_expected:
Then the user should see in the header of that section "(All Times <timezone>)" 
And the timezone should correspond to the local timezone for the team

title: Scenario: Team specific navigation bar
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL of the page is wap.milb.com/<file_code>.
custom_steps:
When
the page is scrolled down to the bottom.
custom_expected:
Then
Above the MiLB navigation bar there should be a team specific navigation bar.

title: Scenario: Contents of Team Navigation Bar when on the Home Page
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL of the page is wap.milb.com/<file_code>
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to the bottom
custom_expected:
Then
The contents of team specific navigation bar should be News, Schedule, Roster, Standings.

title: Scenario: Clicking on News
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL of the page is wap.milb.com/<file code>
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to the footers
and
in the team footer the link for news is clicked on
custom_expected:
Then
The URL that opens should be http://wapb.milb.com/<file code>/news/
such that the file code in this URL matches the file code from the URL in the Given section.
and
the Team specific navigation bar contents is: Home, Schedule, Roster, Standings

title: Scenario: Clicking on Schedule
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to the bottom to the team specific footer
and
the link for Schedule is clicked on
custom_expected:
Then
The page that opens' URL is http://wapb.milb.com/<file_code>/scores/
such that the file_code is the same as that from the given section.
and
the contents of the team specific navigation bar is Home, News, Roster, Standings

title: Scenario: Clicking on Roster
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL of the page is wap.milb.com/<file_code>
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to the bottom
and
the link Roster is clicked on from within the team specific navigation bar
custom_expected:
Then
The url that is opened should be http://wap.milb.com/<file_code>/roster/
such that
the file_code is the same as the one in the given section
and
the contents of the team specific navigation bar is Home, News, Schedule, Standings

title: Scenario:Clicking on Standings
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL of the page is wap.milb.com/<file_code>
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down
and
the Standings link is clicked on
custom_expected:
Then
The URL of the page that opens is http://wap.milb.com/<file_code>/standings/ 
such that file_code is the same as the file_code from the Given section
and
the contents of the team specific navigation bar is Home, News, Schedule, Roster

title: Scneario: Schedules and Results links during off season.
custom_preconds:
Given
The time of year is the off season 
and
the URL of the page is wap.milb.com/<file_code>
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to Schedule & Results
custom_expected:
Then
There should be a link for the schedule for the upcoming year. <nextYear> Schedule
and
there should be a link for the results from the prior year. <priorYear> Results

title: Scenario: Standings section contains link to the league they are a member of
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL of the page is wap.milb.com/<file_code>
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to the Standings section
custom_expected:
Then
There should be a link to the standings of the league the team is a member of.

title: Scenario: Active Roster Link Location
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL of the page is wap.milb.com/<file_code>
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to the Roster Section
custom_expected:
Then
The link for the Active Roster should appear in this section

title: Scenario: Clicking on  the Active Roster Link
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL of the page is wap.milb.com/<file_code>
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to the Roster Section where the Active Roster Link is displayed
custom_expected:
Then
Clicking on the Active Roster links should open http://wap.milb.com/<file_code>/roster/
such that <file_code> is equal to the <file_code> from the given section.

title: Scenario: Team leaders section stat buttons
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL of the page is wap.milb.com/<file_code>
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to the Leaders section.
custom_expected:
Then
There should be six buttons for each stat: AVG, HR, RBI, ERA, W, SO.

title: Scenario: There should be at most 3 players showing under any particular selected stat
custom_preconds:
Given
The Url of the page is wap.milb.com/<file_code>
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to the leaders section
custom_expected:
Then
Under any selected stat there should be no more than 3 players listed. There can be less than 3 but there cannot be more than 3.

title: Scenario: Below selected stat on team home page should be a link for more leaders of that stat.
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL of the page is wap.milb.com/<file_code>
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to the Leaders section and one of the stats buttons is clicked on.
custom_expected:
Then
Directly below the leaders in that stat should be a link More <STAT> Leaders where <STAT> is equal to the stat that was clicked on.

title: Scenario: Beneath that there should be links for Batting and Pitching Leaders
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL of the page is wap.milb.com/<file_code>
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to the Leaders section
custom_expected:
Then
The bottom two links in the section should be Batting Leaders and Pitching Leaders
